decision_conditions: The proposed front porch canopy extension, first floor rear extension, and rear roof extension by reason of its cumulative impact in terms of excessive bulk and mass, and forward projection beyond the predominant front elevation of the host dwelling, would constitute an incongruous and discordant form of development, to the detriment of the character and appearance of the area, visual amenity of the street scene and the uniformity and balance of the semi-detached dwelling pair. Accordingly, the proposal would be contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), Policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and Policies 7.4, 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Council's Housing Design Guidance.
description: Retention of single storey, part two storey, side/rear extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension and installation of two roof lights to front roofslope.
